name: Over The Moonlight
description: Lost and alone, you delve into an intriguing place.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: i5-4430 CPU @ 3.00GHz, Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD6570, NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-7700k Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
